    1: from __future__ import annotations
    2: 
    3: from collections.abc import Sequence
    4: 
    5: from pre_commit import lang_base
    6: from pre_commit.prefix import Prefix
    7: 
    8: ENVIRONMENT_DIR = None
    9: get_default_version = lang_base.basic_get_default_version
   10: health_check = lang_base.basic_health_check
   11: install_environment = lang_base.no_install
   12: in_env = lang_base.no_env
   13: 
   14: 
   15: def run_hook(
   16:         prefix: Prefix,
   17:         entry: str,
   18:         args: Sequence[str],
   19:         file_args: Sequence[str],
   20:         *,
   21:         is_local: bool,
   22:         require_serial: bool,
   23:         color: bool,
   24: ) -> tuple[int, bytes]:
   25:     out = f'{entry}\n\n'.encode()
   26:     out += b'\n'.join(f.encode() for f in file_args) + b'\n'
   27:     return 1, out
